def deploy_to_vercel(output_dir):
    import os
    print('[DEPLOY] Using product page as main entry')
    product_page = os.path.join(output_dir, 'public', 'products', 'crypto-template-001', 'index.html')
    if not os.path.exists(product_page):
        raise FileNotFoundError(f'Product page not found: {product_page}')
    print('[DEPLOY] Product page confirmed:', product_page)
    # 기존 배포 로직 호출 부분 유지
    print('[DEPLOY] Proceeding with existing Vercel upload...')
